verses.roman:
ei saba haya śrī-kṛṣṇera avatāra
nirantara dekhi sabāra bhaktira ācāra

synonyms: ei saba—all of them; haya—are; śrī-kṛṣṇera avatāra—incarnations of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nirantara—constantly; dekhi—I see; sabāra—of all; bhaktira ācāra—behavior as devotees.
translation: These are all incarnations of Lord Kṛṣṇa, yet we always find that they act as devotees.
